title: Toy story 2 [DVD]
creator_credit: John Lasseter, Ash Brannon, Karen Robert Jackson, Walt Disney Productions and Pixar Animation Studios
brief_description: Sequel to Disney’s 1995 hit film “Toy story.” Woody and Buzz are still competing to be the number one toy in Andy’s room. When Andy goes to summer camp the toys have their lives thrown into chaos when Woody is ‘toynapped’ by a nasty toy collector, and ends up in a museum. Buzz Lightyear and the rest of the toys set out on a rescue mission to save their friend from becoming an exhibit. But does Woody want to leave the quiet and peaceful life he has at the museum? Featuring voices by Tom Hanks, Tim Allen and Joan Cusack.
